flawed_nl_solution:
It takes 1 hour to bring the dough to room temp and 2 hours to proof the dough so that's 1+2 = <<1+2=1>>1 hours
It takes 15 minutes to shape the dough, 30 minutes to bake and another 15 minutes to cool for a total of 15+30+15 = <<15+30+15=60>>60 minutes
There are 60 minutes in 1 hour so that takes him 60/60 = <<60/60=1>>1 hour
In total it takes 1+1 = <<1+1=2>>2 hours from start to finish to make the bread
If the bakery opens at 6:00 am and it takes 2 hours to prep then the latest the head baker can show up is 6-2 = <<6-2=4>>4:00 am
